column4: and it seems that im running xgl + compiz now, even without chosing it when logging in !
desktop switching is like a 3d cube
i love this ! but it's really awkward
anybody have a clue where my transparent windows and 3d desktop switching could come from if it's not compiz ?
don`t you know what you have changed?
unless it's all just gnome 2.16 features ...
it won`t come with the default installation
so must have had s.th. like compiz installed before
yeah, i had compiz installed before
but before, i had to log into gdm with the XGL option
then it will be still compiz
you just don`t need the XGL option anymore, I guess
that's weird ... cause i have no 'compix' process running
